feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA
feed.subtitle: SAP S/4HANA Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Hard currency values as realtime posting in asset depreciation area - Turkey POC
entry.content:
Dear sir/madam,

We have added hard currency as parallel currency for ledger postings

Local currency/Company code currency- USD

Global currency - USD

Hard Currency - TRY

we have created new chart of depreciation and created multiple depreciation areas for different ledger postings.

0L - Leading ledger

L1- Local ledger

T1- Tax ledger

For L1 ledger for asset postings, we want to have hard currency values as real time posting

So for ledger L1, we need system to take Hard currency valuess to be posted to GL instead of deriving from company code currency. is there any affect to other ledgers if we make hard currency values as real time posting. Please let us know.

 

Thanks

entry.title: Budget excededing issue
entry.content:
Project Creation

 

WBS , budget allocation, material Procurement. Production order creation and stock transfer to consume in Production order and final product consumed by other wbs

entry.title: Not able to pick the quantity in the delivery
entry.content:
I am unable to pick the quantity in the delivery. The item category is relevant for picking, and Warehouse Management (WM) is not active for this delivery.

Below is the process I followed:

  1. Created Sales Order with MTO.

  2. Created Delivery and performed PGI (inventory posted against the sales order and line item).

  3. Created Invoice.

  4. Created Return Order.

  5. Performed Delivery and PGR ‚Äì stock was received against the return order and scrapped.

  6. Created Subsequent Delivery Free of Charge Order with reference to the return sales order (Requirement type KE, MTO order).

  7. Created Delivery ‚Äì however, unable to pick the quantity in the delivery, even though stock is available.

entry.title: Background Jobs monitoring
entry.content:
Steps to Monitor backgrounds jobs in S/4HANA

Step 1: Login into your Source System S/4HANA

Step 2: Use T-code SM37 then you can see below snap

Step 3: Enter Job name or username which jobs need to monitor if you know Job name or username who created job.

Step 4: Once you are fine with job name or username then you need to proceed with job status need to select
job is schedule or Released or Ready or Active or Finished or Canceled. Select accordingly.

Step 5: Select date time or After event.
note: Mostly Date time only prefer

Step 6: Execute.

entry.title: Reduce SOFFCONT1 table size in database
entry.content:
Hello Team,

We have recently converted ECC to S/4 HANA 2023 , post conversion we are moving documents to BTP DMS from SOFFDB , we can see documents are getting migrated to BTP DMS, but not getting deleted from SOFFCONT1, please let us know to reduce disk size for SOFFCONT1 post migration of documents to BTP DMS.

entry.title: Standard outbound idoc don't send specific fields
entry.content:
Hi all,

I'm working with a standard outbound IDoc in SAP and I'd like to exclude or blank out some specific fields from being sent. Is there a standard tcode or configuration setting that allows me to disable or hide these fields without coding or using user exits?

I need this without changing the idoc type (no custom idoc as a result).

Thanks.

entry.title: Batche management flag of material master data was activated when there is inventory available.
entry.content:
1. 3:00 PM on August 29: The cost accounting department opened the accounting period for September;
  2. 10 p.m. on August 29: Warehouse accounting processed a purchase order receipt (no batch number generated), with a posting date of September 1;
  3. At 8:00 AM on August 30: The material number master file administrator successfully enabled the material batch flag;
  4. After 9:00 AM on August 30: The warehouse accounting made several inventory movements for this item number (all with batch numbers) sequentially.

Request:

This material number was originally planned to activate batch management this month, but the warehouse finance made a receipt without a batch number before the batch flag was activated; now, this inventory generated from that receipt always prompts "Please enter batch number" when moving via MIGO. How can we add a batch number to this inventory?

entry.title: From ECC to S/4HANA - Available ressources and trainings
entry.content:
Hello community,

Currently working as a business analyst consultant in SAP PM, many of my clients are preparing to migrate their SAP environments to S/4HANA. I have a few questions for you to help guide me in the right direction:

  1. Are there any resources available to help me clearly understand the key aspects of what this transition involves? (data governance, data conversion, user functionalities, etc.)
  2. I understand that companies already using S/4HANA mostly rely on the standard transactional GUI interface, while some use FIORI. Are there resources available to better understand FIORI?
  3. Have any fields or tables been removed? For example, regarding maintenance notifications, have certain fields or tables disappeared, resulting in some filters and/or functionalities no longer being available after the update?

In summary, I would like to hear your thoughts on how I can best update myself on the SAP S/4HANA environment to support users with new mobile functionalities, potential data issues during an ECC to S/4HANA migration, and dashboards.

Thank you all!

entry.title: EAM: F6065 : Features Send Output/Output status are greyed out
entry.content:
Hi Team,

Features like Send Output, Retry Output and Output status are greyed out in the FIORI App F6065 i.e. Manage Work Packs" 

As per the SAP Note 3390116, we need to activate PM Object "OPD_EAM_MAINT_JOB_PACKAGE" in BRFPLUS table however SAP Note 2248229 does not include the XML for "OPD_EAM_MAINT_JOB_PACKAGE"

The issue is for the SAPCore 108 Release. I request you to advise the next steps.

Thanks in advance for your support.

Pavan Pilli

SAP EAM Consultant

entry.title: It is not possible to verify credit in BP of different Segments
entry.content: When verifying credit in a BP with different segments, the BP"s original segment is not considered. A message is displayed indicating that the BP has no data in the segment. The relationship between the BPs is FUKM001.

entry.title: RERAPP Save Variant issue
entry.content:
Hello,
We had some issues with RERAPP today where a saved variant was pulling different information in on one person"s computer which was different from the details which were saved on the other users computer. Specifically, a random contract number previously entered in contract field of RERAPP was being pulled into the variant when it was ran by the 2nd employee.

We don"t understand why RERAPP pulling previously run contract information as default when we try to execute it with variant. Please advise.

Thanks,

 

Jayant Patel

entry.content: Since we are on SAP S4H some reports are not able to export to Excel. Here is a concrete example of that: S_ALR_87012277 in GUI but the same issue is via Fiori. Can someone guide a way for me. With ECC this was simpler

Alex

entry.content:

Its throwing error Service: I_AVAILABILITYCHECKTYPEVH_CDS not found / ICF NODE

entry.title: Medical device stock to clinic and traceability for patient billing
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

We have a requirement from our customer who are into medical device manufacturing. The product is shipped to various clinics and hospitals for handover to the patients who are prescribed by the doctor. After the use for prescribed time the device is returned to the company for download of patient data. The invoice is raised after the patient data is downloaded by the company and shared with the clinic, hospital, patient themselves for the services as per any contractual terms (services is the report which is based on data downloaded from the device).

The device is serialized and the same device is used multiple times for different patients after which it becomes non operational and is disposed in controlled environment. (Since the company is FDA regulated)

My question to experts is as follows if someone has come across a similar scenario on any other project.

1) What would be ideal sales process for the product being sent to the hospital or clinic? (Consignment process? - May be too cumbersome for multiple hospitals or clinics to manage in SAP)

2) Once the product is returned back to the company for patient data download what would be the right process to keep track of the device which needs to be then used for a different hospital or patient for reuse? Any suggestions?

3) How to link the billing of the services (report based on download of patient data) with the device and the patient since the device was shipped to hospital or clinic (not directly to patient).

Any suggestion or pointers to any SAP documentation would be appreciated and helpful to find a suitable solution for our customer.

Thanks,

Kartik Shah

entry.title: Why do many power users still prefer SAP GUI over Fiori in S/4HANA?
entry.content:
SAP learner here üëã

As I dig deeper into S/4HANA UX, I keep running into a pattern: even in organizations with a well-set-up Fiori Launchpad, a lot of experienced users still default to SAP GUI. I‚Äôm not trying to start a GUI vs. Fiori war‚Äîgenuinely curious about the practical reasons behind this and what has worked to shift habits

I am looking answers for the following topics: 

  • A concrete task where GUI wins (e.g., ‚ÄúDisplay/Change X,‚Äù ‚ÄúHigh-volume posting,‚Äù ‚ÄúMass edits‚Äù).

  • Why Fiori fell short (speed? feature gap? layout? navigation?)

  • Workarounds or fixes you‚Äôve tried

  • If you‚Äôve successfully moved teams to Fiori, what made the real difference? 

  • Which roles experience the biggest benefits with a switch from GUI to FIORI? Which Roles generally prefer to stay in GUI?

entry.title: Does coding RESERVATION_BADI impact SAP system upgrade?
entry.content:
Hi SAP experts,

Our abaper guys made coding on RESERVATION_BADI to enhance t-code MB22, not copy MB22 program to do an enhancement . I just wondering,  does this method impact SAP system upgrade in the few years later or not ?  Is there any risk we need to know on BADI? Thanks.

entry.title: Is BRF+ integrated with SAP Flexible Workflow for dynamic agent determination?
entry.content:
Hi SAP Community,

I'd like to understand whether SAP Flexible Workflow provides a standard/configurable integration with BRF+ for dynamic agent determination based on business rules, or if the only available approach is to invoke BRF+ through an agent determination BAdI such MMPUR_WORKFLOW_AGENTS_V2?

Any guidance would be appreciated.

Thanks,
Mustafa.
